thread.title: BRIEF-Pernix Therapeutics - Expects To Resume Distribution Of 20 Mg Dosage Strength Of Zohydro ER With Beadtek

title: BRIEF-Pernix Therapeutics - Expects To Resume Distribution Of 20 Mg Dosage Strength Of Zohydro ER With Beadtek

organizations.name: dosage strength of zohydro er with beadtek reuters

text: 09 PM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Pernix Therapeutics - Expects To Resume Distribution Of 20 Mg Dosage Strength Of Zohydro ER With Beadtek Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 27 (Reuters) - Pernix Therapeutics Holdings Inc : * PERNIX THERAPEUTICS HOLDINGS - EXPECTS TO RESUME DISTRIBUTION OF 20 MG DOSAGE STRENGTH OF ZOHYDRO ER (HYDROCODONE BITARTRATE) WITH BEADTEK ON MARCH 28 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
